title: Hourly Avg and Max Memory of Lpars in a Server (GB)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "nmon_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "memory_used_gb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serial =~ /^${serials:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${lpars:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "serial"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Hourly_AvgMem")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "nmon_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "memory_used_gb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serial =~ /^${serials:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${lpars:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["host", "serial"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Hourly_MaxMem")

list.name: serials
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: v.bucket,
  tag: "serial",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "nmon_metrics",
  start: -10y
)

list.name: lpars
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: v.bucket,
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "nmon_metrics" and r.serial =~ /^${serials:regex}$/,
  start: -10y
)

title: Hourly Avg and Max Memory of Lpars in Selected Servers (GB)
